repo_laws: All app router pages under app/** must have exactly one default export.
Do not add useState or useEffect directly to app/** page files unless they are marked as client components with 'use client'. Prefer moving stateful logic into components/.
Never define multiple functions with the same name in a single file.
Do not export multiple handlers with the same HTTP method in the same route.ts file.

app/dashboard/page.tsx: This file must have exactly one default export function DashboardPage.
Any extra widgets or logic should be composed via components, not via a second DashboardPage definition.
app/api/leads/route.ts: This file must contain only one POST handler. If you need to change logic, modify the existing POST instead of adding another.
Do not re-import NextResponse in the same file under a second import statement.

error_patterns.recommendation: Ensure there is only one default export, and no duplicate named exports in the same file.

error_patterns.pattern: the name `POST` is defined multiple times
error_patterns.recommendation: Modify the existing POST handler instead of creating a second one in the same route.ts.

error_patterns.pattern: the name `NextResponse` is defined multiple times
error_patterns.recommendation: Import NextResponse only once at the top of the file and reuse that import.
